description:
These workwear style climbing shorts are built with lightweight and breathable Matrix™ fabric and offer unrestricted movement on the rock.

These slim-fitting, lightweight yet hardwearing climbing shorts offer style climb specific details. They have a jeans style button fastening with a YKK® zip fly and contrasting chain stitch detailing throughout. They have four open pockets, one with an integrated brush slot with secure shockcord loop.

Built with a lightweight Matrix™ stretch fabric and a longer length gusset, they offer complete freedom of movement so you can send it with confidence. Breathable, quick-drying, and ideal for spring and summer climbing trips, they have a part elasticated waistband with belt loops that fits comfortably underneath a harness.
name: Rab Venant Shorts, 11" Inseam - Mens
